item.title: Profile
item.description: Nakajima Nobuhiro 2D/3D Designer, Director Summary A Designer born and raised in Shizuoka, Japan. I have a great passion for design and put full dedication towards everything that I do, ensuring I produce the best possible outcome. I have a proficiency in working within professional environments, yet I am always keen to expand and seek out more opportunities to help improve my abilities and develop further as a designer. My specialties include: Web Design (UI/UX), 3D Modeling, Motion Graphics.
